item.title: Papa's Tool Box
item.author: John Spickes
item.description: Over the weekend I was working in the garage, and I came across an old tool box that I inherited from my grandfather. We called him Papa. I remember him often working on some engine or other, for his boat, or his lawn mower, or his truck. His hands were often a little greasy as I remember him. I set about sorting through the contents of this old, rusted tool box.
